snippet: A confounding thicket of tasks and rules faces people who are trying to sort out the financial side of long-term care for a physically or developmentally disabled family member.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column provides a primer on the complex question of how best to obtain government aid and provide financial assistance for disabled family members.
lead_paragraph: A confounding thicket of tasks and rules faces people who are trying to sort out the financial side of long-term care for a physically or developmentally disabled family member.

headline.print_headline: Assuring Care of a Family Member With Special Needs
headline.seo: Assuring the Care of a Family Member With Special Needs
headline.main: Assuring Care of a Family Member With Special Needs
